content: {"name": "Clear Spring Area Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "The clients should be a resident of Clear Spring Area Food District and should have a paper from Community Action Council.\n", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "30 South Martin Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Clear Spring", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "21722", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.66498, "longitude": -77.90916}, "phones": [{"number": "(301) 331-2739", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}]}
